channel.title: New Life RSC - Private Server!
channel.description:
[center][b]New Life RSC
- XP rates : 8x for non-subscribers & 9.5x for subscribers.
- Batched skills : woodcutting, cooking, fishing, mining, smithing, fletching.
- 7 working Quests.
- 2 new islands for Subscribers.
- Full working Slayer system skill.
- Full working Runecrafting system skill.
- Ability to enchant armours and weapons to make them more powerfull.
- In-game highscore by using “::highscore NAME”.
- NO FATIGUE !
- Skill potions for : fletching, smithing and crafting.
- 2 New armours : Full Dragon & Full Obsidian.
- New lvl required for armours : 1 – Bronze, 5 – Iron, 10 – Steel, 20 – Black, 35 – Mithril, 50 – Adamantite, 65 – Rune, 85 – Dragon, 99 – Obsidian.
- New XP chart -> can be found on forum.
- Each new player will gain 30 days free SUBSCRIPTION sience * 1 Sept. 2014 * and each day will drop 1 SUB day (On 9th sept you will only gain 21 days free SUB).
- Max stat is 99 atm (will raise to 105 later).
Client Download : http://www.fileshare.ro/e30801509
P.S: Old account still work ! [/center]

item.title: New Life RSC - Private Server!
item.dc:creator: @xAdyx xAdyx
item.description:
@xAdyx wrote:

[center][b]Update log :

Client download : http://www.fileshare.ro/e30801509

  • New Slayer mobs : Spike.
  • Slayer lvl required to reach Spike is 65.
  • Spike is located in West of Yanille.
  • Spike drops : dragon items, runes, coins.
  • Rewrited account creation system.
  • Max skill lvl is 99 now.
  • Max combat lvl is 123.
  • Obsidian armours are implemented into the game.
  • Obsidian armours can reach +8.
  • Gamblers are now added in Edgevill West.

Upcoming next update :

  • Gift box for those who reach lvl 99 in a stat with random reward.
  • New slayer mobs that drop Obsidian items.
  • Obsidian will be added to smithing list.
  • Obsidian rock & bars.[/b][/center]
inspectah:

No fatigue and the idea of Obsidian sound fun, best of luck guys.

Thank you very much Inspectah !

Read full topic
